text:
Sofia Richie and Scott Disick Reunite in Malibu as She Reiterates They Are Just Friends

If Scott Disick ever got his own reality show, it could be called Rollin’ With the Homies. Because he sure seems to like hanging out with Sofia Richie. The two were photographed…
